Sheldon Fries

Hello! I'm a GIS Developer at Rizing Geospatial with 4 years of experience in the industry. In my free time, I enjoy coding side projects, watching and writing about hockey, and lifting.

I've earned my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science after studying at Simon Fraser University and Langara College. Previously, I've worked at Esri Canada as a Developer and Canadian Web Hosting as a Junior Programmer.

Technologies

JavaScript

Years of experience with frameworks, interfaces, and other add-ons such as Angular, Node.js, React.js, and jQuery.
Web & Application Design

Worked with HTML and CSS (including Less and Sass) in designing the front-end of websites and web applications. Built Android applications following material design principles.
Programming Languages

Knowledgeable in Python, C#, C/C++, and Java through work, personal projects, and class assignments.
Version Control

Experienced with Git and its commonly used platforms such as GitHub and GitLab.
Miscellaneous

Adept at using the Microsoft Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.), and Adobe Photoshop.
